name: slskd
description: slskd is a modern self-hosted Soulseek client daemon with a web UI. It allows searching, downloading, and managing peer-to-peer music transfers on headless servers.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Manages searches and downloads through modern browser-based UI

features.title: Search Functionality
features.description: Searches the network for music files by artist, album, or track

features.title: Download Queue
features.description: Manages multiple simultaneous downloads with priority controls

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Shares your music library with other Soulseek users

features.title: User Browsing
features.description: Browses other users' shared files and libraries

features.title: Transfer Management
features.description: Controls upload and download speeds and connection limits
